function.name: search_ollama_models
function.description: Searches the Ollama model library for models matching a given query.

query.description: The search term for the model, e.g. 'gemma' or 'llava'.

function.name: fetch_ollama_metadata
function.description: Fetches detailed metadata for a model using the exact URL (string) from ollama.com. The key must be 'url'.

url.description: The full URL of the model detail page on ollama.com.
